attributes.action: Better/quicker diagnoses care for people with epilepsy
attributes.additional_details: The NICE.guidance needs to be looked at and changed to meet the needs of people with epilepsy.
attributes.background: People with epilepsy are not getting the right care and root cause.diagnoses quick enough through the current NHS system.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because changing the guidance would be the responsibility of the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE), not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition calling for more funding or an awareness campaign around diagnosis and care for people with epilepsy.
